creditCardMessage: {{name}}'s {{cardType}} ending with {{lastFourDigitCardNo}} was used to complete this transaction, which will appear on your credit card statement as "CHIMP FDN * DONATION".
recurringCreditCardMessage: {{name}}'s {{cardType}} ending with {{lastFourDigitCardNo}} will be charged {{amount}} on the {{recurringDay}} of each month, starting on {{recurringDate}}.
quaziDonationMessageForAllocations: Apologies,{{name}}. To send your gift,please wait for a confirmation email from us.
quaziDonationSuccessMessage: Thank you, {{name}}. We're processing your transaction and will add {{amount}} to your CHIMP Account shortly.
quaziDonationSuccessMessageTwo: We'll send you an email within 24 hours confirming that the amount has been added.
quaziSuccessSecondMessageforAllocation: It's taking us a little longer than expected to process the {{amount}} top up that's needed to send your gift. We're still working on it and will send you an email within 24 hours confirming that the amount has been added to your CHIMP Account.
quaziSuccessThirdMessageforAllocation: When you get the email from us, please come back to your CHIMP Account to send your gift to {{recipient}}.
companyAddMoney: Nicely done, {{name}}. You added {{amount}} to the {{companyName}} CHIMP Account.
addMoney: Nicely done, {{name}}. You added {{amount}} to your CHIMP Account.
userSingleCoverFeesAllocation: Thank you, {{name}}. You gave {{amount}} (plus {{coverFeesAmount}} in covered third-party processing fees) to {{to}}.
nonUserSingleCoverFeesAllocation: Thank you, {{name}}. You gave {{amount}} (plus {{coverFeesAmount}} in fees) from {{fromName}}'s CHIMP Account to {{to}}.
nonUserSingleAllocation: Thank you, {{name}}. You gave {{amount} from {{fromName}}'s CHIMP Account to {{to}}.
fromToMultipleRecipient: Nice work, {{name}}. You gave {{number}} gifts of {{amount}} for a total of {{total}} sent.
nonrecurringCCAllocationDetails: {{creditCard}} was used to complete this transaction, which will appear on the credit card statement as "CHIMP FDN * DONATION".
nonrecurringDonationDetails: In addition, {{amount}} was matched by {{matchingParty}} and added to {{to}}'s CHIMP Account.
timeForSendingCharity: Your gift will be sent to the recipient at the beginning of {{month}}.
userRecurringAllocation: Thank you, {{name}}. You scheduled a monthly gift of {{amount}} to go to {{to}}.
nonUserRecurringAllocation: Thank you, {{name}}. You scheduled a monthly gift of {{amount}} by {{fromName}} to {{to}}.
recurringAllocationDetails: This gift will be made from {{fromName}}'s CHIMP Account on the {{dayOfMonth}} of each month, starting on {{startsOn}}.
recurringAllocationNotes: If there isn't enough money in this CHIMP Account to cover the gift, we'll charge {{creditCard}}. A new tax receipt will be issued and the charge will appear on the credit card statement as "CHIMP FDN * DONATION".
companyRecurringDonation: Nicely done, {{name}}. You now added {{amount}} to the {{companyName}} CHIMP Account each month.
companyRecurringTaxReceiptMessage: Each time, a tax receipt will be automatically posted to the {{companyName}} CHIMP Account and the transaction will appear on the credit card statement as "CHIMP FDN * DONATION".
recurringDonation: Nicely done, {{name}}. You scheduled {{amount}} to be added to your CHIMP Account each month.
recurringTaxReceiptMessage: Each time, a tax receipt will automatically be posted to your CHIMP Account and the transaction will appear on your credit card statement as "CHIMP FDN * DONATION".
